title: Traits and Features
content: ture The lightweight build of this Steel Watcher grants it Advantage on Dexterity saving throw and an additional 9 m movement speed. Steel Watchers Alert Passive Feature You gain +5 to Initiative and can no longer be surprised. Grant by feat. Deepened Pact Feature Pleased with your service, your otherworldly patron added new boons to the terms of your pact. Blade pactholders gain an extra attack with their pact weapon. The Pact of the Chain's familiar also gains an extra attack. Pact of the Tome
